messages.title: 3 POSITIVE REASONS TO VOTE FOR CHRIS

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Chris is part of the community, serving as a school governor, a local councillor, and works as a volunteer for a variety of local organisations.
Chris has a track record of action, campaigning on local issues like supporting the Hospital, campaigning against Fire Station closures, and fighting to protect the local environment.
Chris fights to protect front-line services, acknowledging the hard work of teachers, police officers, fire-fighters and NHS professionals; pledging to always fight to protect front-line services.

issues.environment: Fighting to protect our local environment.

politicalExperience.achievements: Volunteering for local organisations, campaigning on local issues, supporting the Hospital, campaigning against fire station closures, protecting local environment.

contactInformation.address: Free post CHRIS WHITE, 27 St Mark's Road, Leamington Spa CV32 6DL
